00027 BOOLEAN BeginUIPlan( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
00028 {
00029       gubNumUIPlannedMoves = 0;
00030       gpUIPlannedSoldier                        = pSoldier;
00031       gpUIStartPlannedSoldier       = pSoldier;
00032       gfInUIPlanMode                 = TRUE;
00033 
00034       gfPlotNewMovement    = TRUE;
00035 
00036       ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Entering Planning Mode" );
00037 
00038       return( TRUE );
00039 }

00041 BOOLEAN AddUIPlan( UINT16 sGridNo, UINT8 ubPlanID )
00042 {
00043       SOLDIERTYPE                   *pPlanSoldier;
00044       INT16                                     sXPos, sYPos;
00045       INT16                                     sAPCost = 0;
00046       INT8                                      bDirection;
00047       INT32                                     iLoop;
00048       SOLDIERCREATE_STRUCT          MercCreateStruct;
00049       UINT8                                     ubNewIndex;
00050 
00051       // Depeding on stance and direction facing, add guy!
00052       
00053       // If we have a planned action here, ignore!
00054 
00055 
00056       // If not OK Dest, ignore!
00057       if ( !NewOKDestination( gpUIPlannedSoldier, sGridNo, FALSE, (INT8)gsInterfaceLevel ) )
00058       {
00059             return( FALSE );
00060       }
00061 
00062 
00063       if ( ubPlanID == UIPLAN_ACTION_MOVETO )
00064       {
00065             // Calculate cost to move here
00066             sAPCost = PlotPath( gpUIPlannedSoldier, sGridNo, COPYROUTE, NO_PLOT, TEMPORARY, (UINT16) gpUIPlannedSoldier->usUIMovementMode, NOT_STEALTH, FORWARD,  gpUIPlannedSoldier->bActionPoints );
00067             // Adjust for running if we are not already running
00068             if (  gpUIPlannedSoldier->usUIMovementMode == RUNNING )
00069             {
00070                   sAPCost += AP_START_RUN_COST;
00071             }
00072 
00073             if ( EnoughPoints( gpUIPlannedSoldier, sAPCost, 0, FALSE ) )
00074             {
00075                   memset( &MercCreateStruct, 0, sizeof( MercCreateStruct ) );
00076                   MercCreateStruct.bTeam                    = SOLDIER_CREATE_AUTO_TEAM;
00077                   MercCreateStruct.ubProfile          = NO_PROFILE;
00078                   MercCreateStruct.fPlayerPlan  = TRUE;
00079                   MercCreateStruct.bBodyType          = gpUIPlannedSoldier->ubBodyType;
00080                   MercCreateStruct.sInsertionGridNo         = sGridNo;
00081 
00082                   // Get Grid Corrdinates of mouse
00083                   if ( TacticalCreateSoldier( &MercCreateStruct, &ubNewIndex ) )
00084                   {                 
00085                         // Get pointer to soldier
00086                         GetSoldier( &pPlanSoldier, (UINT16)ubNewIndex );
00087 
00088                         pPlanSoldier->sPlannedTargetX = -1;
00089                         pPlanSoldier->sPlannedTargetY = -1;
00090 
00091                         // Compare OPPLISTS!
00092                         // Set ones we don't know about but do now back to old ( ie no new guys )
00093                         for (iLoop = 0; iLoop < MAX_NUM_SOLDIERS; iLoop++ )
00094                         {
00095                               if ( gpUIPlannedSoldier->bOppList[ iLoop ] < 0 )
00096                               {
00097                                           pPlanSoldier->bOppList[ iLoop ] = gpUIPlannedSoldier->bOppList[ iLoop ];
00098                               }
00099                         }
00100 
00101                         // Get XY from Gridno
00102                         ConvertGridNoToCenterCellXY( sGridNo, &sXPos, &sYPos );
00103 
00104                         EVENT_SetSoldierPosition( pPlanSoldier, sXPos, sYPos );
00105                         EVENT_SetSoldierDestination( pPlanSoldier, sGridNo );
00106                         pPlanSoldier->bVisible = 1;
00107                         pPlanSoldier->usUIMovementMode = gpUIPlannedSoldier->usUIMovementMode;
00108 
00109 
00110                         pPlanSoldier->bActionPoints = gpUIPlannedSoldier->bActionPoints - sAPCost;
00111 
00112                         pPlanSoldier->ubPlannedUIAPCost = (UINT8)pPlanSoldier->bActionPoints;
00113 
00114                         // Get direction
00115                         bDirection = (INT8)gpUIPlannedSoldier->usPathingData[ gpUIPlannedSoldier->usPathDataSize - 1 ];
00116 
00117                         // Set direction
00118                         pPlanSoldier->bDirection = bDirection;
00119                         pPlanSoldier->bDesiredDirection = bDirection;
00120 
00121                         // Set walking animation
00122                         ChangeSoldierState( pPlanSoldier, pPlanSoldier->usUIMovementMode, 0, FALSE ); 
00123                         
00124                         // Change selected soldier
00125                         gusSelectedSoldier = (UINT16)pPlanSoldier->ubID;
00126 
00127                         // Change global planned mode to this guy!
00128                         gpUIPlannedSoldier = pPlanSoldier;
00129 
00130                         gubNumUIPlannedMoves++;
00131 
00132                         gfPlotNewMovement    = TRUE;
00133 
00134                         ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Adding Merc Move to Plan" );
00135 
00136                   }
00137             }
00138             else
00139             {
00140                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Merc will not have enough action points" );
00141             }
00142       }
00143       else if ( ubPlanID == UIPLAN_ACTION_FIRE )
00144       {
00145         sAPCost = CalcTotalAPsToAttack( gpUIPlannedSoldier, sGridNo, TRUE, (INT8)(gpUIPlannedSoldier->bShownAimTime ) );
00146 
00147             // Get XY from Gridno
00148             ConvertGridNoToCenterCellXY( sGridNo, &sXPos, &sYPos );
00149 
00150 
00151             // If this is a player guy, show message about no APS
00152             if ( EnoughPoints( gpUIPlannedSoldier, sAPCost, 0, FALSE ) )
00153             {
00154                   // CHECK IF WE ARE A PLANNED SOLDIER OR NOT< IF SO< CREATE!
00155                   if ( gpUIPlannedSoldier->ubID < MAX_NUM_SOLDIERS )
00156                   {
00157                         memset( &MercCreateStruct, 0, sizeof( MercCreateStruct ) );
00158                         MercCreateStruct.bTeam                    = SOLDIER_CREATE_AUTO_TEAM;
00159                         MercCreateStruct.ubProfile          = NO_PROFILE;
00160                         MercCreateStruct.fPlayerPlan  = TRUE;
00161                         MercCreateStruct.bBodyType          = gpUIPlannedSoldier->ubBodyType;
00162                         MercCreateStruct.sInsertionGridNo         = sGridNo;
00163 
00164                         // Get Grid Corrdinates of mouse
00165                         if ( TacticalCreateSoldier( &MercCreateStruct, &ubNewIndex ) )
00166                         {                 
00167                               // Get pointer to soldier
00168                               GetSoldier( &pPlanSoldier, (UINT16)ubNewIndex );
00169 
00170                               pPlanSoldier->sPlannedTargetX = -1;
00171                               pPlanSoldier->sPlannedTargetY = -1;
00172 
00173                               // Compare OPPLISTS!
00174                               // Set ones we don't know about but do now back to old ( ie no new guys )
00175                               for (iLoop = 0; iLoop < MAX_NUM_SOLDIERS; iLoop++ )
00176                               {
00177                                     if ( gpUIPlannedSoldier->bOppList[ iLoop ] < 0 )
00178                                     {
00179                                                 pPlanSoldier->bOppList[ iLoop ] = gpUIPlannedSoldier->bOppList[ iLoop ];
00180                                     }
00181                               }
00182 
00183                               EVENT_SetSoldierPosition( pPlanSoldier, gpUIPlannedSoldier->dXPos, gpUIPlannedSoldier->dYPos );
00184                               EVENT_SetSoldierDestination( pPlanSoldier, gpUIPlannedSoldier->sGridNo );
00185                               pPlanSoldier->bVisible = 1;
00186                               pPlanSoldier->usUIMovementMode = gpUIPlannedSoldier->usUIMovementMode;
00187 
00188 
00189                               pPlanSoldier->bActionPoints = gpUIPlannedSoldier->bActionPoints - sAPCost;
00190 
00191                               pPlanSoldier->ubPlannedUIAPCost = (UINT8)pPlanSoldier->bActionPoints;
00192 
00193                               // Get direction
00194                               bDirection = (INT8)gpUIPlannedSoldier->usPathingData[ gpUIPlannedSoldier->usPathDataSize - 1 ];
00195 
00196                               // Set direction
00197                               pPlanSoldier->bDirection = bDirection;
00198                               pPlanSoldier->bDesiredDirection = bDirection;
00199 
00200                               // Set walking animation
00201                               ChangeSoldierState( pPlanSoldier, pPlanSoldier->usUIMovementMode, 0, FALSE ); 
00202                               
00203                               // Change selected soldier
00204                               gusSelectedSoldier = (UINT16)pPlanSoldier->ubID;
00205 
00206                               // Change global planned mode to this guy!
00207                               gpUIPlannedSoldier = pPlanSoldier;
00208 
00209                               gubNumUIPlannedMoves++;
00210                         }
00211 
00212 
00213                   }
00214 
00215                   gpUIPlannedSoldier->bActionPoints = gpUIPlannedSoldier->bActionPoints - sAPCost;
00216 
00217                   gpUIPlannedSoldier->ubPlannedUIAPCost = (UINT8)gpUIPlannedSoldier->bActionPoints;
00218 
00219                   // Get direction from gridno
00220                   bDirection = (INT8)GetDirectionFromGridNo( sGridNo, gpUIPlannedSoldier );
00221 
00222                   // Set direction
00223                   gpUIPlannedSoldier->bDirection = bDirection;
00224                   gpUIPlannedSoldier->bDesiredDirection = bDirection;
00225 
00226                   // Set to shooting animation
00227                   SelectPausedFireAnimation( gpUIPlannedSoldier );
00228 
00229                   gpUIPlannedSoldier->sPlannedTargetX = sXPos;
00230                   gpUIPlannedSoldier->sPlannedTargetY = sYPos;
00231 
00232                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Adding Merc Shoot to Plan" );
00233 
00234             }
00235             else
00236             {
00237                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Merc will not have enough action points" );
00238             }
00239       }
00240       return( TRUE );
00241 }

00244 void EndUIPlan(  )
00245 {
00246       int                     cnt;
00247       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
00248 
00249       // Zero out any planned soldiers
00250       for( cnt = MAX_NUM_SOLDIERS; cnt < TOTAL_SOLDIERS; cnt++ )
00251       {
00252             pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ];
00253 
00254             if ( pSoldier->bActive )
00255             {
00256                   if ( pSoldier->sPlannedTargetX != -1 )
00257                   {
00258                         SetRenderFlags(RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
00259                   }
00260                   TacticalRemoveSoldier( pSoldier->ubID );
00261             }
00262 
00263 
00264       }
00265       gfInUIPlanMode                 = FALSE;
00266       gusSelectedSoldier   = gpUIStartPlannedSoldier->ubID;
00267 
00268       gfPlotNewMovement    = TRUE;
00269 
00270       ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Leaving Planning Mode" );
00271 
00272 }
00273 
00274 BOOLEAN InUIPlanMode( )
00275 {
00276       return( gfInUIPlanMode );
00277 }

00279 
00280 void SelectPausedFireAnimation( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
00281 {
00282       // Determine which animation to do...depending on stance and gun in hand...
00283 
00284       switch ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight )
00285       {
00286             case ANIM_STAND:
00287 
00288                   if ( pSoldier->bDoBurst > 0 )
00289                   {
00290                         ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, STANDING_BURST, 2 , FALSE );
00291                   }
00292                   else
00293                   {
00294                         ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, SHOOT_RIFLE_STAND, 2 , FALSE );
00295                   }
00296                   break;
00297 
00298             case ANIM_PRONE:
00299                   ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, SHOOT_RIFLE_PRONE, 2 , FALSE );
00300                   break;
00301 
00302             case ANIM_CROUCH:
00303                   ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, SHOOT_RIFLE_CROUCH, 2 , FALSE );
00304                   break;
00305 
00306       }
00307 
00308 }
